document.full_text: the would-be terrorists in zack russell's satiric comedy 'just cause' are actually middle-class brooklynites in their 20s, with no cause, no ideology and no jobs.
document.title: theater review | 'just cause' : young, aimless and primed for a revolution
lines_and_colors: the would-be terrorists in zack russell's satiric comedy 'just cause' are actually middle-class brooklynites in their 20s, with no cause, no ideology and no jobs.
